Method Detail

connect

public OverthereConnection connect()
Description copied from interface: OverthereConnectionBuilder
Creates the connection that corresponds to the arguments that were passed in the two-arg constructor of this class. The first argument is a String that specifies the type (and is identical to the name field of the Protocol annotation). The second argument is the ConnectionOptions.

Specified by:
connect in interface OverthereConnectionBuilder
Returns:
the created connection.

protected OverthereFile getFileForTempFile(OverthereFile parent,
                                           java.lang.String name)
Description copied from class: OverthereConnection
Invoked by OverthereConnection.getTempFile(String) and OverthereConnection.createConnectionTemporaryDirectory() to create an OverthereFile object for a file or directory in the system or connection temporary directory.

Parameters:

Returns:
